

*how to initialize a springboot project,

*maven

* folder structure of springboot project

* @SpringbootApplication   ---> @Configuration, @EnableAutoConfiguration, @ComponetScan

* Models --> @Entity, @Id, @GeneratedValue, @NotNull .....................................

* Repositories: extends CRUDRepository<>

* @controller, @RestController  @RequestMapping

* @PostMapping , @GetMapping

* serive layer ---> @Service

---> Remaining topic ---> spring security --> password hashing, username-password based 									authentication,

						authorization
			Exception handling, session and cookies

			



Important Terminology :: dependency injection, inversion of control, beans, object factory.

functionality :: verify email, generate pdf, google login, forget password, verify phone



---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


javascript ---> async await, promises, callback hell, callback functions, closures, fetch,
		event loop, arrow functions.

React ---> 	react-portal, useEffect, context Api, props, redux, pure component, 				customHookCreation
